title: E-Commerce Platform
shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration and admin dashboard.
fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce solution built with modern technologies. This platform includes a customer-facing storefront, an admin dashboard for inventory management, order processing, and analytics. Features include secure payment integration with Stripe, real-time inventory tracking, user authentication, shopping cart functionality, and responsive design for mobile and desktop users.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering

title: SaaS Dashboard Analytics
shortDescription: Modern analytics dashboard for SaaS applications with real-time data visualization.
fullDescription: A powerful analytics dashboard designed for SaaS businesses to track key performance indicators, user engagement, and business metrics. The dashboard provides real-time data visualization with interactive charts, customizable reports, and automated insights. Built with a focus on performance and scalability to handle large datasets.

title: Mobile Banking App
shortDescription: Secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication and real-time transactions.
fullDescription: A secure and user-friendly mobile banking application that provides customers with complete control over their finances. The app features biometric authentication, real-time transaction monitoring, bill payments, money transfers, and account management. Built with security as the top priority, implementing end-to-end encryption and multi-factor authentication.

title: AI-Powered Content Generator
shortDescription: Content creation platform using OpenAI API for generating blog posts and marketing copy.
fullDescription: Revolutionary content creation platform that leverages advanced AI models to generate high-quality blog posts, social media content, and marketing copy. Features SEO optimization, content scheduling, multi-language support, and integration with popular CMS platforms. Built to help content creators and marketers scale their content production efficiently.

title: Real Estate Platform
shortDescription: Property listing platform with advanced search filters and virtual tours.
fullDescription: Comprehensive real estate platform connecting buyers, sellers, and agents. Features advanced property search with AI-powered recommendations, virtual tours using 360° photography, mortgage calculator, market analytics, and agent management system. Includes mobile app for on-the-go property viewing and management.

title: Video Streaming Platform
shortDescription: Netflix-like streaming service with user subscriptions and content management.
fullDescription: Full-featured video streaming platform with adaptive bitrate streaming, user subscriptions, content recommendation engine, and comprehensive admin panel. Supports multiple video formats, subtitle integration, offline viewing, and cross-platform compatibility. Built for scalability to handle millions of concurrent users.

title: Task Management App
shortDescription: Collaborative project management with real-time updates.
fullDescription: Advanced task management and project collaboration platform with real-time updates, team communication, time tracking, and project analytics. Features Kanban boards, Gantt charts, resource allocation, and integration with popular development tools. Designed for teams of all sizes with scalable architecture.

title: AI Chat Interface
shortDescription: Modern chatbot UI with natural language processing.
fullDescription: Intelligent conversational AI platform with advanced natural language processing capabilities. Features context-aware responses, multi-language support, sentiment analysis, and integration with business systems. Designed for customer support, lead generation, and user engagement with customizable personality and branding.

title: Crypto Trading Dashboard
shortDescription: Real-time cryptocurrency trading platform with advanced charts.
fullDescription: Professional cryptocurrency trading platform with real-time market data, advanced charting tools, portfolio management, and automated trading strategies. Features multi-exchange integration, risk management tools, social trading capabilities, and comprehensive market analysis with ML-powered insights.

title: Social Media App
shortDescription: Instagram-like social platform with photo sharing and stories.
fullDescription: Modern social media platform with photo and video sharing, stories, live streaming, and social commerce features. Includes advanced privacy controls, content moderation AI, influencer analytics, and monetization tools. Built with scalable microservices architecture to support millions of users.

title: Healthcare Management System
shortDescription: Complete healthcare platform for patient management and telemedicine.
fullDescription: Comprehensive healthcare management system designed for modern medical practices. Features patient record management, appointment scheduling, telemedicine consultations, prescription management, and medical billing. Includes HIPAA compliance, secure data storage, and integration with medical devices and laboratory systems.

title: Online Learning Platform
shortDescription: Educational platform with video courses and interactive quizzes.
fullDescription: Modern e-learning platform offering comprehensive online education solutions. Features include video-based courses, interactive quizzes, progress tracking, certification systems, and collaborative learning tools. Supports multiple learning formats and adaptive learning paths based on student performance.

title: IoT Smart Home Dashboard
shortDescription: Control and monitor smart home devices from a unified dashboard.
fullDescription: Intelligent IoT dashboard for managing smart home devices and automation. Features real-time device monitoring, automated scheduling, energy consumption tracking, security system integration, and voice control capabilities. Supports multiple IoT protocols and provides predictive analytics for home optimization.

title: Restaurant POS System
shortDescription: Point-of-sale system for restaurants with inventory and order management.
fullDescription: Comprehensive point-of-sale system designed specifically for restaurants and food service businesses. Features order management, kitchen display systems, inventory tracking, staff management, customer loyalty programs, and detailed analytics. Supports multiple payment methods and integrates with delivery platforms.

title: Fitness Tracking App
shortDescription: Mobile fitness app with workout plans and progress tracking.
fullDescription: Comprehensive fitness tracking application with personalized workout plans, nutrition guidance, and progress monitoring. Features AI-powered exercise recommendations, social challenges, wearable device integration, and professional trainer consultations. Includes gamification elements to motivate users.

shortDescription: Enterprise solution for tracking products through the supply chain.
fullDescription: Advanced supply chain management system providing end-to-end visibility and control over product flow. Features include vendor management, inventory optimization, demand forecasting, logistics tracking, and compliance monitoring. Built with blockchain integration for transparency and traceability.

title: Music Streaming Platform
shortDescription: Spotify-like music streaming service with playlists and discovery.
fullDescription: Full-featured music streaming platform with high-quality audio streaming, personalized playlists, music discovery algorithms, and social features. Includes artist profiles, podcast support, offline downloads, and cross-platform synchronization. Built for scalability to handle millions of tracks and users.

title: Event Management Platform
shortDescription: Complete solution for organizing and managing events with ticketing.

title: Weather Analytics Dashboard

features: Mobile app for customers and staff
